document_data.name: Jarg
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jarg''' was a mercenary of the [[Zhentarim]] that operated out of their [[Zhentarim hideout (Risen Road)|hideout]] within caves deep beneath the [[Risen Road]] on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Had a peach of a shot on you as you came in.|Jarg, to visitors of their hideout.}}
document_data.Personality: He was exceptionally confident and even cocky about his skill as an [[archer]].
document_data.Possessions: Jarg wielded a pair of [[hand crossbow]]s, one in either hand.
document_data.History: When the Zhentarim hideout was ordered to be demolished in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Jarg was among those setting up explosives.
